Considerations touching the true way to suppress popery in this kingdom by making a distinction between men of loyal and disloyal principles in that communion : on occasion whereof is inserted an historical account of the Reformation here in England. Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
[16], 164 p.
Printed for Henry Brome ..., London : 1677.
Errata: prelim. p. [16]. Includes bibliographical references. This item can also be found as part of Lloyd's Several tracts against popery located at reel 388:23. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
